items.title: Kata for software developers
items.summary: Build a blog with VuePress. With static site generator, it's pretty easy to build your own blog. If you're familiar with Vue, VuePress could be a good choice. Even though you've never used vue before, you can still use the out-of-box theme.

items.title: Kafka usage — tips&hints
items.summary:
Today we will talk about Apache Kafka. As you probably already know, Kafka is “a distributed streaming platform”, so it could be used as Queue, Message Bus, etc.
